meanings.definition: Not able to be postponed or delayed.
meanings.sent1: The deadline for the project was nondeferrable, so we had to finish it on time.
meanings.sent2: The nondeferrable meeting had to start promptly at 9 AM.
meanings.sent3: The nondeferrable alarm clock made sure I woke up early every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her nondeferrable decision to resign shocked everyone in the office.
meanings.sent5: The nondeferrable nature of the exam made studying essential.

meanings.sent1: The bill payment was a nondeferrable that had to be taken care of immediately.
meanings.sent2: The urgent task was a nondeferrable that required immediate attention.
meanings.sent3: The nondeferrable package delivery arrived just in time for the party.
meanings.sent4: His dream of traveling the world was a nondeferrable that he finally pursued.
meanings.sent5: The nondeferrable opportunity to learn a new skill should not be missed.
